A backslash \`\\' is written \`\\e'. To begin a line
with a period you can . use a zero-width \`\\&'
character. {}

"title
======

A \`\~'character A non-breaking space ! \[bla\] <bla\>
^bla\#$%"'

—A dialogue starts with a mark. Two backslashes \\\\.

Text \\.
Text \\
normal text
